content.description: Sit start on a sloping rail feature. Pick your feet and make a powerful move to the good edge above. One move wonder but its a fun one on great schist(?).
content.location: The left corner of the front of the boulder, facing the road.

content.description: Start at the base of the scoop, stand up on smears and use the right rising tips crack for a left hand. Work your way right, following the crack as the holds get better. Round the arete to jugs and poor feet and top out straight up.
content.location: The obvious slabby scoop on the side of the boulder facing away from the road

content.description: Stem between the right-facing sidepulls on The Menagerie and on the right side of the bottom of the scoop/slab. Put your foot on and stand up and finish the scoop part of The Menagerie. Its like an indoor volume slab climb!
content.location: Between The Menagerie and Flying Saucer

content.description:
Deceptive problem looks easy but it takes a lot to figure it out. Start in the juggy part of the crack and pick some smear feet. Now either dyno up left to the top jug or go static left to the lower right side jug then cross up to the top jug. Fun either way.

 V0-1 stand variation. Start on the top jug and just do the fun slab mantle to top it out
content.location: From The Menagerie walk around to the left til you see the crack.

content.description: Start in the nice crack and go right hand to a gaston ringlock and cross left above it. Move right to side pulls and jump your foot to the slab and use tiny seam crimps to stand up on your foot and climb out the slab and top out far to the right on the good lip holds.
content.location: Back side of the boulder under the wave like feature in the nice crack.

content.description: Start in the crimps on the horizontal crack and squat on some feet and stand up to a tiny sidepull crimp then get some higher feet and jump up to the better hold or use terrible crimps to climb up static. Same top out as The Menagerie
content.location: To the right of the scoop/slab that is the end of The Menagerie

content.description: Sit start at the right end of the horizontal finger crack. Traverse the lip left following slopers and the finger crack before meeting up with the top out for alien dyno.
content.location: front of the boulder, facing the notch road

content.description: Near Upper Upper. Some high quality rock with cool harder problems.
